entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is Ron's brother who has left the family due to his loyalty towards the Ministry. He slammed the door in his mother's face when she tried to talk to him.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is an organization that Percy and his father are loyal to. Harry's family is considered traitors to the Ministry.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Mum is Ron's mother who has been in a state of distress due to her son's departure from the family.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Dad is Ron's father who is also considered a traitor to the Ministry by Percy.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a friend of Ron's family and has sworn under his breath when he heard Percy's words towards Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the narrator who shares about his brother's departure from the family.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a person who was spoken to by Percy in an unpleasant manner.

entities.name: london
entities.description: London is the city where Percy is currently living.

relationships.description: Percy's loyalty lies with the Ministry.
Mum is Percy's mother who tried to talk to him but was slammed by the door.
Dad is considered a traitor to the Ministry by Percy.
Percy and his mother have a disagreement as he slammed the door in her face.
